titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1868) to authorize appropriations for the National Institute of Standards and Technology for fiscal years 2008, 2009, and 2010, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1868) to authorize appropriations for the National Institute of Standards and Technology for fiscal years 2008, 2009, and 2010, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-118, by Ms. Sutton.

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. It shall be in order to consider as an original bil for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Science and Technology now printed in the bill.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 48.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 350.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 189 (Roll no. 275).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 1868 (Technology Innovation and Manufacturing Stimulation Act of 2007).
